nodes.text: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: A Junior Novel

Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: A Junior Novel is a junior novelization that adapts the events of the 2019 film of the same name. The novel was written by Michael Kogge, and was published by Egmont UK Ltd on April 16, 2020. The American edition was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on April 21, 2020.

The conclusion of the Skywalker Saga is finally here. This junior novel retelling of Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, contains deleted and extended scenes, including exclusive scenes you won't find anywhere else! This book also includes an 8-page full-color insert.

Relive all the action and adventure of the new movie, Star Wars The Rise of Skywalker in this awesome junior novel. Join Rey, Finn and Poe in their fight against the First Order and the dangerous Kylo Ren. Discover all the new characters, locations and movie moments from the latest episode in this legendary franchise.
